Edit the config. A default config will be created if it doesn't exist

Command Flags

  --editor : path to editor
    type : string
    default : vi
    configpath : editor
    envvars : [EDITOR]
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by envvar) : emacs

Inherited Section Flags

  --help , -h : Print help information
    type : string enum with choices [detailed]
    default : detailed
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : detailed


Footer:

Examples:

	# Use defaults
	grabbit config edit

	# Override defaults
	grabbit config edit --config-path /path/to/config --editor code
